channel.title: First Half-Life Experiences
channel.description:
Hi guys I thought I'd play a little game, list down when, (only if) you first played Half-Life and Half-Life 2, what you played it on and say what you like most about them. You can also include the official Half-Life expansions if you wish! :smiley:
Half-Life, PS2, circa 2003 - I really like the innovative gameplay and how it combined the FPS shooter genre with the puzzle genre and made for a really exciting game.
Half-Life 2, Xbox 360, Jan 2008 - I loved how you get put nearly straight into the action and how the story develops throughout, best part of the game though is the physics and how it can be manipulated with the Gravity Gun.

item.title: First Half-Life Experiences
item.dc:creator: bulbman
item.description:
trance:

HL2: The day it came out whenever it was. I was like this shit is so god damn epic.

I’m not sure if I played HL1 at all before HL2. I still haven’t ever completed it. I can’t stand the late 90’s graphics. Waiting for BMS =/

FUCK YOU.>

Anyway, meeting my first zombie in Half-Life, scared the shit out of me. I was only seven at the time, I just watched him fuck up the guard then he turned around and I was like :[, then I bashed it’s face in and was like then I saw the other one and was like :retard:.

Read full topic

Except Decay, which I still played on PC first, but only about half a year ago.
